input.sentences: everyone gathered at church in order to honor the troops .
when the preacher got up | the soldiers all saluted him .
important people such as the mayor gave a speech to everyone present .
a soldier then started playing the national anthem .
everyone immediately stood and paid their respects .
output.sentences: The man sat in the back of the funeral.
It was time to say goodbye to another brother in arms.
The people speaking at the funeral would never know the deceased like he did.
The tribute played on the trumpet reminded him of all the other 'brothers' he'd lost.
He felt so alone in this crowded room, but he had become accustomed to it.
